Title: WinRT Series Manager
Description: Series Manager provides you with a huge collection of series from TheTVDB and allows you to stay up to date with your most favorite ones via notifications.
HomeWiki:
Series Manager for Windows 8.1

Series Manager provides you with a huge collection of series metadata delivered by TheTVDB.com. Currently the app is designed for the Windows 8 look and is running with the WinRT and .NET Framework. The entire source code is written in C# and makes use of a customized MVVM Framework called "WinRT MVVM Framework".

Series Manager currently allows you to:

  • Search for series
  • View series metadata (overview, actors, seasons and episodes, ...)
  • Informes you about new episodes (today, this week, this month, this year)
  • Badge Notification (Counter of how many episodes currently unwatched)
  • Browse a huge collection of Fanarts of each series and
    • Save Fanarts to the harddrive
    • Set as lockscreen
    • Set as series Background
  • Snapping (Windows 8.1 variable size snapping)
  • Use it for free!!

I'm developing this app since March 2013 together with two of my friends. Due to the fact that there is still a lot of work, I'm searching for new developers who wanna join programming and together creating an awesome app.

Requirements:

  • Windows 8 and Windows 8.1 (WinRT) knowledge
  • MVVM Framework knowledge
  • Time :D
